title: Ordered by the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament assembled that all persons, as well peers as others, that are papists and now in or about the cities of London or Westminster ... are hereby required ... to depart from the same ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
notes: At head of title: Die Veneris 30, Decembris 1680.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
